page.title: 04Life Style,Pensioners,5 Rds
page.content: Mr.Daniels is 77 years old and has tea in bed at 5:45am and is up by 6.Before breakfast he likes two open coal fires and says that he would never have central heating.For breakfast he usually eats cornflakes but sometimes has bacon.Later he walks to the local store/Post office for his newspapers. He always takes the Western Mail.He enjoys breakfast TV and crosswords.Dinner is at 11:30 after which he sometimes goes to town with his wife.Unlike many other older residents he owns a car.This is an advantage as bus services have been decreased.Evenings are spent watching TV or listening to classical music. He watches S4C but dislikes programmes from North Wales,as regional dialects differ.He enjoys comedy and most sports.After a 'cup of cocoa' he goes to bed about 10pm.
